name: Space Jargon
description:
Credit to aw3sum (a.k.a. Nematic Fifth/nematic5) on in the AOE Jam Discord for providing the music and SFX.

WASD to move, arrow keys to enter in patterns.

H to hide the player input screen.

In the tutorial level, use the scroll bar for more information. It might be hard to see that there's a scroll bar, but it's there.

Your goal is to deliver a message to each of the three crewmates. Press "next Message" after you give the crewmate the message. After the last one, one final "next message" will show you the results screen

NOTE: Please let the pattern finish playing before pressing "Next Pattern." You won't be able to see what the captain says. I broke this feature minutes before the deadline, haha.
